title: Circular v. Linear Time, Both, And, the Chiastic Structure of Reality
description:
Kevin joins me to discuss the linear nature of time, spirals, cones of possibility and the straight spring. We also explore the creative impulse in writing and painting.

Video on the helical nature of the earth's trajectory around the sun and the sun's motion through space:  https://youtu.be/0jHsq36_NTU
